addressFrom(address,uint32).details: Rebuilds the contract address from a normal address and transaction nonce

params._nonce: The transaction nonce from which to generate a contract address
params._origin: The non-contract address derived from a user's public key

lock(uint8,bytes,bool).details: Locks up the value sent to contract in a new Lock

params.edgewareKey: The bytes representation of the target edgeware key
params.isValidator: Indicates if sender wishes to be a validator
params.term: The length of the lock up

signal(address,uint32,bytes).details: Signals a contract's (or address's) balance decided after lock period

params.contractAddr: The contract address from which to signal the balance of
params.edgewareKey: The bytes representation of the target edgeware key
params.nonce: The transaction nonce of the creator of the contract
